languages.text: "Собираетесь выковать из дикарей бойцов Астра Милитарум? Это непростая задача, но похоже {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}вы знаете{/d}, что делаете". {n}Йегер вбивает распоряжения в инфопластину.{/n} "Это все. Можете подниматься на шаттл, а остальное мы..."

"Are you going to forge these savages into soldiers of the Astra Militarum? A difficult project, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}you seem to know{/d} what you are doing." {n}Yeager enters a few commands into her data-slate.{/n} "That is all. You can board the shuttle now, and we will—"
languages.original_text: "Собираетесь выковать из дикарей бойцов Астра Милитарум? Это непростая задача, но похоже {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}вы знаете{/d}, что делаете". {n}Йегер вбивает распоряжения в инфопластину.{/n} "Это все. Можете подниматься на шаттл, а остальное мы..."

traits.locale_text: "Are you going to forge these savages into soldiers of the Astra Militarum? A difficult project, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}you seem to know{/d} what you are doing." {n}Yeager enters a few commands into her data-slate.{/n} "That is all. You can board the shuttle now, and we will—"

"Are you going to forge these savages into soldiers of the Astra Militarum? A difficult project, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}you seem to know{/d} what you are doing." {n}Yeager enters a few commands into her data-slate.{/n} "That is all. You can board the shuttle now, and we will—"

languages.text: “你真的打算把这群野蛮人改造成星界军的士兵吗？这是个很困难的计划，但你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}看起来很有信心{/d}。”{n}耶格尔敲着数据板，输入了几个命令。{/n}“目前已经没有其他事情了，你可以上穿梭机了，而我们——”
languages.original_text: "Are you going to forge these savages into soldiers of the Astra Militarum? A difficult project, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}you seem to know{/d} what you are doing." {n}Yeager enters a few commands into her data-slate.{/n} "That is all. You can board the shuttle now, and we will—"

traits.locale_text: “你真的打算把这群野蛮人改造成星界军的士兵吗？这是个很困难的计划，但你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}看起来很有信心{/d}。”{n}耶格尔敲着数据板，输入了几个命令。{/n}“目前已经没有其他事情了，你可以上穿梭机了，而我们——”

languages.text: 「この野蛮人たちを帝国防衛軍の兵士に鍛え上げるつもりですか？困難な計画ですが、どうやら{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}あなたは自信がおあり{/d}のようですね」{n}イェーガーがデータスレートにいくつかのコマンドを入力する。{/n}「以上です。今すぐシャトルに搭乗していただけます。そして…」
languages.original_text: "Are you going to forge these savages into soldiers of the Astra Militarum? A difficult project, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}you seem to know{/d} what you are doing." {n}Yeager enters a few commands into her data-slate.{/n} "That is all. You can board the shuttle now, and we will—"

traits.locale_text: 「この野蛮人たちを帝国防衛軍の兵士に鍛え上げるつもりですか？困難な計画ですが、どうやら{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}あなたは自信がおあり{/d}のようですね」{n}イェーガーがデータスレートにいくつかのコマンドを入力する。{/n}「以上です。今すぐシャトルに搭乗していただけます。そして…」

languages.text: «¿Va a transformar a estos salvajes en soldados del Astra Militarum? Es un proyecto difícil, pero {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}parece saber{/d} lo que hace». {n}Yeager introduce unos comandos en su tablilla de datos.{/n} «Eso es todo. Ya puede subir a bordo de la lanzadera y...».
languages.original_text: "Are you going to forge these savages into soldiers of the Astra Militarum? A difficult project, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}you seem to know{/d} what you are doing." {n}Yeager enters a few commands into her data-slate.{/n} "That is all. You can board the shuttle now, and we will—"

traits.locale_text: «¿Va a transformar a estos salvajes en soldados del Astra Militarum? Es un proyecto difícil, pero {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}parece saber{/d} lo que hace». {n}Yeager introduce unos comandos en su tablilla de datos.{/n} «Eso es todo. Ya puede subir a bordo de la lanzadera y...».

languages.text: "Werdet Ihr diese Wilden zu Soldaten des Astra Militarum schmieden? Ein schwieriges Projekt, aber {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}Ihr scheint zu wissen{/d}, was Ihr tut." {n}Yeager gibt einige Befehle in ihren Datablock ein.{/n} "Das ist alles. Ihr könnt jetzt an Bord des Shuttles gehen, und dann werden wir ..."
languages.original_text: "Are you going to forge these savages into soldiers of the Astra Militarum? A difficult project, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}you seem to know{/d} what you are doing." {n}Yeager enters a few commands into her data-slate.{/n} "That is all. You can board the shuttle now, and we will—"

traits.locale_text: "Werdet Ihr diese Wilden zu Soldaten des Astra Militarum schmieden? Ein schwieriges Projekt, aber {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}Ihr scheint zu wissen{/d}, was Ihr tut." {n}Yeager gibt einige Befehle in ihren Datablock ein.{/n} "Das ist alles. Ihr könnt jetzt an Bord des Shuttles gehen, und dann werden wir ..."

languages.text: "Bu yabanileri Astra Militarum'un askerleri hâline mi getireceksiniz? Zor bir proje fakat {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}sizin bilginize zeval gelmez{/d}." {n}Yeager, databelasına birkaç komut giriyor.{/n} "İşte bu kadar. Artık mekiğe binebilirsiniz, biz de..."
languages.original_text: "Are you going to forge these savages into soldiers of the Astra Militarum? A difficult project, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}you seem to know{/d} what you are doing." {n}Yeager enters a few commands into her data-slate.{/n} "That is all. You can board the shuttle now, and we will—"

traits.locale_text: "Bu yabanileri Astra Militarum'un askerleri hâline mi getireceksiniz? Zor bir proje fakat {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}sizin bilginize zeval gelmez{/d}" {n}Yeager, databelasına birkaç komut giriyor.{/n} "İşte bu kadar. Artık mekiğe binebilirsiniz, biz de..."

languages.text: « Allez-vous transformer ces sauvages en soldats de l'Astra Militarum ? Ce ne sera pas simple, mais {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}vous semblez savoir{/d} ce que vous faites. » {n}Yeager saisit quelques commandes dans sa plaque de données.{/n} « Bien. Vous pouvez monter à bord de la navette. Ainsi, nous pourrons... »
languages.original_text: "Are you going to forge these savages into soldiers of the Astra Militarum? A difficult project, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}you seem to know{/d} what you are doing." {n}Yeager enters a few commands into her data-slate.{/n} "That is all. You can board the shuttle now, and we will—"

traits.locale_text: « Allez-vous transformer ces sauvages en soldats de l'Astra Militarum ? Ce ne sera pas simple, mais {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}vous semblez savoir{/d} ce que vous faites. » {n}Yeager saisit quelques commandes dans sa plaque de données.{/n} « Bien. Vous pouvez monter à bord de la navette. Ainsi, nous pourrons... »
